Docs.summary: Contains a list of retention policy tags associated with a user. The class is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

Docs.summary: Gets a list of retention policy tags associated with a user. The property is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.
